snippet.title: Equiverse - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2950400/Equiverse/

Experience the ultimate ecosystem simulator! Equiverse is a cozy simulation game where you care for different species of animals, earn income by keeping them happy, unlock helpful companions, and defend against invading monsters. Can you keep your ecosystem thriving?
#gaming #indiegame #cozy 

Might & Magic by Alexander Nakarada (CreatorChords) | https://creatorchords.com
Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
Creative Commons / Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
